Sentencas: Optimizing thermal coupling of an integrated system and improving its energy cascade utilization (ECU) level are important ways to improve system performance.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system

Sentencas: An integrated power generation system consisting of an anode recirculation internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (ARIR-SOFC), a gas turbine (GT), an organic Rankine cycle (ORC) waste heat recovery system and a liquefied natural gas (LNG) supply system is established.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system

Sentencas: Additionally, heat exchange network (HEN) subsystem formed by heat exchange streams is specially considered to further improve ECU level.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system

Sentencas: Optimization model is proposed where HEN scheme is optimized simultaneously with operating parameters and working fluids of ORC.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system

Sentencas: Because of the complexity of model, it is key to focus on the solution strategy.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system

Sentencas: An adaptive improved multi-objective particle swarm optimization (IMOPSO) algorithm is established to improve diversity and accuracy of solutions.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system

Sentencas: Finally, a case is solved and results show that HEN scheme plays an important role in system performance.
Titulo: Multi-objective optimization and algorithm improvement on thermal coupling of SOFC-GT-ORC integrated system
